Flow.description: GTMS-29029 : Ensure IB lead owned CML accounts do not route back to ADR GTMS-27001 : Make "Rejection Feedback" field mandatory when an AE user rejects the ADR Transfers GTMS-11613 Project Alpha 2.0
Flow.label: Reject ADR

fields.name: Criteria
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer

ï»¿

ERROR: Rejection Not Permitted

You cannot reject a transfer with this status. Please submit a ticket to Sales Ops here if you believe this is an error.

fields.name: Duplicate_Account_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: Duplicate Account


Please provide the link to the duplicate account so that Sales Ops can merge the accounts.

fields.name: Out_of_Geo_Instructions_1
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: Out of Geo


Please update the billing address information for this account prior to rejecting it.

fields.name: Out_Of_Segment_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: Out of Segment


Please update the segmentation information for this account prior to rejecting it.

fields.name: BANT_Instructions_3
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: {!Rejection_Reason}


Please classify the BANT criteria you were able to identify based on your discussion with the prospect. If you were not able to classify the criteria, select "Not Identified"

fields.name: BANT_Instructions_2
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: {!Rejection_Reason}


Please classify the BANT criteria you were able to identify based on your discussion with the prospect. If you were not able to classify the criteria, select "Not Identified"

fields.name: reject
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer: {!Rejection_Reason}


You have successfully rejected this transfer.

fields.name: Reject_Transfer_Description
fields.fieldText:
Reject ADR Transfer


Please fill in all of the criteria below including demo method, the reason for your rejection, and feedback for the ADR. Remember that this feedback is utilized to improve the quality of our transfers, so provide clear and constructive feedback!{!SelectaRejectionReason}

fields.name: Demo_Method
fields.fieldText: How did you complete this demo?

fields.name: Product_Fit_Checkbox
fields.fieldText: Product Fit impacted Samsara's ability to meet the needs of this prospect.
fields.helpText: Product fit is an issue when Samsara's current product and functionality is not able to be adapted to meet the needs of an end user.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessageRejectionReason
textTemplates.text: ERROR: Please select a rejection reason.
